title: cyber operation
extract: One category of offensive cyber operations that US doctrine defines is 'cyberspace attack'—actions that manipulate, degrade, disrupt or destroy targets. 6. UK military doctrine defines offensive cyber operations as 'activities that project power to achieve military objectives in, or through, cyberspace.Jun 26, 2018
extract_html: One category of offensive cyber operations that US doctrine defines is 'cyberspace attack'—actions that manipulate, degrade, disrupt or destroy targets. 6. UK military doctrine defines offensive cyber operations as 'activities that project power to achieve military objectives in, or through, cyberspace.Jun 26, 2018
